question: Is it permissable to read qadha namaaz, instead of sunnat nammaz??
answer:
QUESTION
When i go for namaaz, i was wondering if it was ok for me to read all my qadha namaaz's instead of reading the sunnat namaaz.
ANSWER


Share:
It is necessary to perform the Sunnat-e-Muakkadah (emphasised Sunnats) before and after Fardh Salaats. That cannot be wavered in favour of performing Qadhaa Salaats.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
